content: and 28 chain 1 space 1 to commence the round stndst in stndst from previous round 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 3 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches round 7 half_double_crochet in all stitches around 4 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain 1 to commence the round hdcstndst in stndst from previous round 5 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 2 half_double_crochet over next chain space 6 double_crochet in each of the next three double_crochet stitches 3 half_double_crochet in next double_crochet 7 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 4 half_double_crochet over next chain space 8 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 26 times 9 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 6 slip_stitch into the hdcstndst from step 1 10 repeat steps 6 to 9 five times stitch count 56 half_double_crochet 11 double_crochet in next last stitch page | 8 12 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 adding earflaps brief instructions images 5 & 6 stitch count 49 double_crochet and 7 chain 1 space smaller solid earflap image 5a round 11 half_double_crochet in all stitches around 1 to commence the round hdcstndst in stndst from previous round place stitch markers 11 stitches apart in a position as per earflaps shown in image 6 2 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 dcs make two earflaps as follows 3 half_double_crochet over chain space row 1 commence earflap with an hdcstndst in the first stitch and then work a half_double_crochet in 4 half_double_crochet in each of next 7 dcs each of the following 10 stitches 11 stitches 5 half_double_crochet over chain space row 2 chain 1 turn work 2hdctog over the first two hdcs reduction stitch half_double_crochet in 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 five times each subsequent stitch until reaching the last two stitches and then 2hdctog over the 7 half_double_crochet in each of the last 3 dcs last two hdcs reduction stitch 9 stitches excluding the chain 1 and including the two 8 slip_stitch into the hdcstndst from step 1 reduction stitches at the beginning and end of row stitch count 56 half_double_crochet row 3 5 repeat step 2 three times a triangle should be forming with each row reducing by two stitches 3 stitches should remain at the end of row 5 excluding 1 chain round 12- chain 1 space for every other stitch row 6 chain 1 turn work and then 3hdctog over the 3 dcs from the previous row 1 to commence the round stndst in hdcstndst from previous round row 7 ch1 turn work and then single_crochet in 3hdctog from the previous row 2 chain 1 and skip the next stitch earflap chain turn work and then work multiple hdcstndst to make a chunky chain 3 double_crochet in the next stitch that is the length of your preference chunky knot the chain or if you prefer first make 4 chain 1 and skip the
